page.title: 16WEST MONKTON POST OFFICE.
page.content: The post office and general stores is a 300 year old house.A number of rooms are as they were when it was built.The original house is now 3 or 4 separate houses.Inside,the doors can still be traced.It was changed into a shop in 1948.The owners live above their shop. It is very cramped.One of the bedrooms is above next door's bathroom. Their bathroom is built onto 1 of their bed- rooms. The corridors are crooked and rather low. The old post office sorting room now acts as a food store room.The post is taken by van to Taunton to be sorted by computer. Most of their customers are old.They have 120 pensioners who are kind.They sell mainly stationery and food. Most of the villagers shop in supermarkets in Taunton, so the village store acts as an emergency supplier. _
